basic.title: Basic Cleaning
intro: When you book our apartment or house cleaning services in Sydney, our system takes into account the overall size of your property to ensure our cleaners can provide a thorough and comprehensive clean.

We determine the size of your home based on the number of bedrooms and bathrooms. Additionally, you have the option to add any optional extras to customise your service according to your specific needs.
basic.subtitle: Our general basic cleaning services include:

services.title: Kitchen:
details: Cleaning the exterior of the stove and oven;
Wiping down cabinet and appliance exteriors;

services.title: Bathroom:
details: Clean and sanitise the bathtub and recess;

basic.options: Change sheets and towels and put them in the laundry. Consult us for more information.

commercial.title: Commercial Cleaning
intro: If your company values ​​maintaining a good image for its customers and recognises the benefits of a good working environment for its employees, Focus Cleaning – Office Cleaning service is the ideal service for you.
For us the details are the difference to do well.
The cleaning methodology, the training of the staff and the quality of the products and equipment used allows us to achieve higher results than the competition and usually in less time.
In addition to cleaning, if desired, Focus Office Cleaning service can take care of the various logistical aspects of maintaining your office, such as the supply and replacement of consumables.
Ask us for a free quote and get to know in depth the Office Cleaning service we offer.
commercial.subtitle: Our general commercial cleaning services include:

services.title: General Areas:
details: Empty trash cans and replace lines;
Vacuum or sweep and mop the floors;

services.title: Restrooms:
details: Clean and disinfect toilets, sinks, and counters;
Refill soap, hand towels, and toilet paper;
Sweep or vacuum and mop floors.

services.title: Kitchen / Break Room:
details: Vacuum or sweep and mop floors;

services.title: Hallways / Common Areas:
details: Vacuum or sweep and mop floors;
